# How to Install and Patch Origin Pro 9.0 SR2 b87 on Windows 10
 
Origin Pro 9.0 SR2 b87 is a powerful data analysis and graphing software that can help you perform various scientific and engineering tasks. However, installing and patching it on Windows 10 can be tricky if you don't have the right instructions. In this article, we will show you how to download, install and patch Origin Pro 9.0 SR2 b87 on Windows 10 step by step.
 
## Origin Pro 9.0 SR2 b87 Update Serial Key

## Step 1: Download Origin Pro 9.0 SR2 b87 Update
 
The first thing you need to do is to download the latest Origin Pro 9.0 SR2 b87 update from the official website of OriginLab Corporation[^1^]. You can also use this link: [https://www.originlab.com/index.aspx?go=Support/SoftwareUpdates](https://www.originlab.com/index.aspx?go=Support/SoftwareUpdates). The update file is about 91 MB in size and contains bug fixes and improvements for Origin Pro 9.0.
 
## Step 2: Download and Extract the Patch for Origin Pro 9.0 SR2 b87
 
The next thing you need to do is to download and extract the patch for Origin Pro 9.0 SR2 b87 from a reliable source[^2^]. You can also use this link: [https://maksimbelov0yo.wixsite.com/provamkobi/post/originlab-originpro-9-0-sr2](https://maksimbelov0yo.wixsite.com/provamkobi/post/originlab-originpro-9-0-sr2). The patch file is about 22 MB in size and contains a crack for Origin Pro 9.0 SR2 b87 that will activate it for free.
 
After downloading the patch file, you need to extract it using a tool like WinRAR or 7-Zip. You will get a folder called "OriginPro.X.Y.Z.Z.SR2" that contains two files: "OriginPro.X.Y.Z.Z.SR2.patches" and "origin.9.0.sr1-patch.exe".
 
## Step 3: Install Origin Pro 9.0 SR2 b87 Update
 
Now that you have downloaded and extracted the update and the patch files, you are ready to install Origin Pro 9.0 SR2 b87 on your Windows 10 computer. To do that, follow these steps:
 
1. Run the update file "OriginPro90SR2b87.exe" as an administrator.
2. Follow the instructions on the screen to complete the installation.
3. Do not launch Origin Pro after the installation is finished.

## Step 4: Patch Origin Pro 9.0 SR2 b87
 
The final step is to patch Origin Pro 9.0 SR2 b87 using the patch file that you extracted earlier. To do that, follow these steps:

1. Go to the folder where you installed Origin Pro 9.0 SR2 b87 (usually C:\Program Files\OriginLab\Origin90).
2. Copy the file "origin.9.0.sr1-patch.exe" from the extracted folder "OriginPro.X.Y.Z.Z.SR2" and paste it into the installation folder.
3. Run the file "origin.9.0.sr1-patch.exe" as an administrator.
4. Select "ok9.dll" from the list of files and click on "Patch".
5. A message will appear saying that the file has been patched successfully.
6. Close the patcher and delete it from the installation folder.

## Congratulations! You have successfully installed and patched Origin Pro 9.0 SR2 b87 on Windows 10!
 
You can now launch Origin Pro from your desktop or start menu and enjoy its features without any limitations. You can also check your license status by going to Help > About Origin in the software menu.
